did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications featuring translations from Faroese and Icelandic by Randi Ward.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Randi Ward is a writer, translator and photographer from West Virginia.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Publications featuring translations from Faroese and Icelandic and photography by Randi Ward. Also several CDs.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Randi Ward collection, #8493. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Contains K. A. did.unittitle: Beyond the Grey by Gudrid Hansdóttir
Dýrð Í dauðaþögn by Ásgeir Trausti
Stjørnudust úr føroyskum yrkíngum í 200 ár

scopecontent.p: Four volume anthology. Accompanied by Kestrel (Department of Language and Literature, Fairmont State University) postcard from Randi Ward featuring poem "Shade" from Kestrel issue 32. Anthology contains poem "Grannsíggin" by Ward (Faroese name: Randi á Ryggi) on p. 124-125 of Volume I. Volume I also contains Símun av Skarði, Jóhanna Maria Skylv Hansen, Gudmundur Bruun, Bjørgfinnur Nielsen, Kári P, Katrin Reinert, Bergur Rønne Moberg, Jóannes Dalsgaard, Regin Dahl, Jóan Petur uppi í Trøð, Mina Reinert, Rasmus Effersøe, Hans Dávur Matras, Andrias Ziska, Oskar Hermannsson, Kim Simonsen, Gunnar Hoydal, Janus Djurhuus, Andrea í Norðradali, Poul Klein, Hans Andrias Djurhuus, Billa Hansen, Tummas N. Djurhuus, Hans J. Glerfoss, Malan Poulsen, Carl Jóhan Jensen, Marna Glerfoss á Kamarinum, Anna Mattsson, Jens Hendrik Djurhuus, Mina Reinert, Jacobsen Gata, Sigri M. Gaini, Louis Zachariassen, Martin Næs, Nólsoyar-Páll, Hans Dávur Matras, Jørgen Hammershaimb, Tóroddur Poulsen, Alexandur Weihe, Sólmundur Joensen, Nólsoyar-Páll, Jóhanna Maria Skylv Hansen, Jóannes Patursson, Tróndur Olsen, Hjalmar Hammershaimb, M. A. Jacobsen, Rannvá Skeel Johannesen, Katrin Reinert, Nancy Vesturbú, Jóanes Nielsen, Hans Dalsgaard, Sólrún Michelsen, Rasmus Rasmussen, Oddfíður M. Rasmussen, Jnley á Løgmansbø, Ebba Henze, Sólrún Michelsen, Nancy Vesturbú, Martin Næs, Sjóvarbóndin, Esmar Jacobsen Gata, Anna Sofía á Rípuni, Bernhard Brim, Hans J. Glerfoss, Jákup Berg, Bjørgfinnur Nielsen, Rasmus Effersøe, Arnbjørn Ólavsson Dalsgarð, Arnbjørn Danielsen, Símun Mikal Zachariassen, Louis Zachariassen, Óðin Ódn, Karsten Hoydal, Dunganon, Dánial Hoydal, Heðin M. Lyrics for "Tides" written by Randi Ward.

did.unittitle: Mantis A Journal of Poetry, Criticism, and Translation, Issue 13

did.unittitle: Vencil tíðarrit fyri skaldskap á føroyskum, nr. 15/2015, 8. árg.

scopecontent.p: Randi Ward contributes “Seks yrkingar”: “Froskur,” “Á snórinum,” “Snarljós,” “Bað,” “Slóttur,” “Uppringing” (Óla Jákup Niclasen týddi) pg. 46-48.

did.unittitle: Sigmunds kvæði yngra (Randi Ward skipar): 1 CD-ROM
Miscellaneous correspondence from Randi Ward to Curator, Fiske Icelandic Collection

scopecontent.p: Notes dated 01 September and 27 October 2015; holiday card for 2015.
